channel.title: thurible – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: And share with otters
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: I was an altar boy in my youth (misspent in a very real sense). Cassocks, monstronces, sacristies; such were my domain. I did a good line in self-effacing crossing of the altar that would stand me in good stead in later life (pitching up late for seminars is much like mistiming one’s walk down the Continue reading →
